divs: Sighting Detailshere is a photo I took on the 30th of this month,just west of our house, what I believe to be a ufo, it hovered for a short bit,and then took off at very high velocity and was gone in a matter of a few secssee what you think
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Yukon
There were no other sightings in Yukon on or around September 30th 2003
